definitions.definition: A convertible car : a car with a removable or foldable roof able to convert from a closed to open vehicle and back again .
A convertible security : a stock , bond , etc. that can be turned into another ( usually common stock ) under certain set terms .
A computer able to convert from laptop to tablet and back again .

main_definition: ( dated , in the plural ) Interchangeable things or terms .
secondary_definitions: ( vehicles ) A convertible car : a car with a removable or foldable roof able to convert from a closed to open vehicle and back again .
( finance ) A convertible security : a stock , bond , etc. that can be turned into another ( usually common stock ) under certain set terms .
( computing ) A computer able to convert from laptop to tablet and back again .
